text: I am finding it difficult to use MySQL with Python in my windows system.
I have tried to compile MySQL-python-1.2.3b1 (which is supposed to work for Python 2.6 ?
) source code using the provided setup scripts.
The setup script runs and it doesn't report any error but it doesn't generate _mysql module.
I have also tried setting up MySQL for Python 2.5 with out success.
The problem with using 2.5 is that Python 2.5 is compiled with visual studio 2003 (I installed it using the provided binaries).
I have visual studio 2005 on my windows system.
Hence setuptools fails to generate _mysql module.
